text: This area is supposed to be about java-specific implementations of object-oriented programming object-oriented programming. The areas should be used interchangeably in the learning process, as it can sometimes be easier to see the object-oriented concepts in Java context, and in most cases will be easier to understand java implementations if you have the proper object oriented approach. Some of the sites in this area goes beyond the curriculum, but can be useful if you want to make themselves better acquainted with java or stumble across implementations of interest.
